text: Elizabeth Hutchinson Jackson (2 November 1737 - 2 November 1781) was a nurse in the American Revolution and mother of Andrew Jackson, Robert Jackson & Hugh Jackson II ==Birth and early life== Elizabeth was born November 2, 1737 to Joseph Hutchinson & Hannah Howerton ==Family== She had a family with Andrew Jackson Sr. in 1765, they moved to Waxhaw lands they had one last child, unfortunately, her husband died before the child was born. She named him Andrew Jackson after his dad. ==Death== She died November 2, 1781 after getting Cholera trying to help the war efforts. Category:1737 births Category:1781 deaths Category:American nurses
title: Elizabeth Hutchinson Jackson
